statements: SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_name = 'CO2';
SELECT pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM pollutants WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE measurement_time > '12:00';
SELECT id, pollutant_name, measurement_date FROM pollutants ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_level, MIN(pollutant_level) AS min_level FROM pollutants;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_name = 'Carbon Monoxide' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, measurement_time ASC
SELECT id, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_level, pollutant_name FROM pollutants GROUP BY pollutant_name HAVING avg_level > 30
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM pollutants
SELECT * FROM pollutant_data WHERE pollutant_level > 10;
SELECT pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM pollutant_data WHERE measurement_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 'b712cfc2-94de-47df-bd70-0cda66c8c633';
SELECT * FROM pollutant_data WHERE pollutant_id = 'a31ba9a9-2484-4deb-a5aa-2467ca2c45e9';
SELECT measurement_date, AVG(pollutant_level) as average_level FROM pollutant_data GROUP BY measurement_date ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_data WHERE pollutant_level > 10 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE measurement_date = '2022-07-15' ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM pollutant_data WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31' ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC
SELECT * FROM pollutant_data JOIN location_data ON pollutant_data.pollutant_id = location_data.location_id ORDER BY location_name, measurement_date DESC
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level, AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_pollutant_level FROM pollutant_data WHERE measurement_date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT id, pollutant_name, level, date_measured FROM pollutant_levels;
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_description FROM pollutant_sources;
SELECT * FROM measurement_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM measurement_locations;
SELECT id, pollutant_name, level FROM pollutant_levels ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_levels WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY date_measured DESC;
SELECT pollutant_name, level, date_measured FROM pollutant_levels JOIN measurement_locations ON pollutant_levels.id = measurement_locations.location_id;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS measurement_count FROM pollutant_sources JOIN pollutant_levels ON pollutant_sources.source_id = pollutant_levels.id GROUP BY source_name HAVING measurement_count > 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM measurement_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_levels WHERE pollutant_name LIKE '%O2%' ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM sensors JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id;
SELECT pollutant_name, level FROM pollutant_levels WHERE level > 50;
SELECT id, date_time FROM pollutant_levels WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Central%';
SELECT sensor_name, level FROM sensors JOIN pollutant_levels ON sensors.location_id = pollutant_levels.id WHERE level > 50 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT pollutant_name FROM pollutant_levels WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT sensor_name, value, timestamp FROM sensors JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id WHERE value < 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_levels ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT city_name, timezone FROM cities WHERE country_id = 2
SELECT pollutant_name, AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_level FROM pollutant_levels GROUP BY pollutant_name HAVING AVG(pollutant_level) > 50
SELECT country_name, continent FROM countries WHERE continent = 'Europe'
SELECT city_name, measurement_value, measurement_date FROM measurements JOIN cities ON measurements.city_id = cities.id WHERE city_name LIKE 'L%'
SELECT * FROM pollutant_levels ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT city_name, measurement_value FROM cities INNER JOIN measurements ON cities.id = measurements.city_id WHERE measurement_value > 50
SELECT country_name, continent FROM countries WHERE continent = 'Asia'
SELECT city_name, measurement_date FROM cities INNER JOIN measurements ON cities.id = measurements.city_id WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT pollutant_name, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_level FROM pollutant_levels GROUP BY pollutant_name
